import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Collapse, Navbar, NavbarToggler, NavbarBrand, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, UncontrolledDropdown, DropdownToggle, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, Container, Row, Col, Card, CardTitle, CardText, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, } from 'reactstrap'; import * as styles from '../styling/styles'; import CustomMapContainer from '../components/CustomMapContainer'; import joeImage from '../images/joeImage.jpg'; import melissaImage from '../images/melissaImage.jpg'; import berniceImage from '../images/berniceImage.jpg'; const contactInfo = { joe: { mobile: '(000)-000-0000', email: 'joe@gmail.com', }, melissa: { mobile: '(000)-000-0000', email: 'melissa@gmail.com', }, bernice: { mobile: '(000)-000-0000', email: 'bernice@gmail.com', }, } export default class Home extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.toggle = this.toggle.bind(this); this.state = { isOpen: false }; } toggle() { this.setState({ isOpen: !this.state.isOpen }); } displayContactInfo(contactInfo) { return ( Mobile Phone Number: Email Address: ); } render() { return (
